name: ssun4
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: mpi(wss(c0, c1), wss(c0, cun(c2, c1)), wss(c1, cun(c2, c1)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wss(c0, c1), wss(c0, cun(c2, c1)))
-| wss(c1, cun(c2, c1))
-| wi(wss(c0, c1), wi(wss(c1, cun(c2, c1)), wss(c0, cun(c2, c1))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wss(c0, c1), wss(c0, cun(c2, c1)))
-| wss(c1, cun(c2, c1))
-| wi(wss(c0, c1), wi(wss(c1, cun(c2, c1)), wss(c0, cun(c2, c1))))

|- wi(wss(c0, c1), wss(c0, cun(c2, c1)))
-| wi(wss(c0, c1), wi(wss(c1, cun(c2, c1)), wss(c0, cun(c2, c1))))

body.origin: |- wi(wss(c0, c1), wi(wss(c1, cun(c2, c1)), wss(c0, cun(c2, c1))))

comment: Subclass law for union of classes. (Contributed by NM, 14-Aug-1994.)
